outline:
1. to cling, stick, stay close, cleave, keep close, stick to, stick with, follow closely, join to, overtake, catch
    1. (Qal)
      1. to cling, cleave to
      2. to stay with
    2. (Pual) to be joined together
    3. (Hiphil)
      1. to cause to cleave to
      2. to pursue closely
      3. to overtake
    4. (Hophal) to be made to cleave
kjv_def: abide fast, cleave (fast together), follow close (hard after), be joined (together), keep (fast), overtake, pursue hard, stick, take.
strongs_def: properly, to impinge, i.e. cling or adhere; figuratively, to catch by pursuit
